meanings.sent1: After a few years of relaxation, she decided to unretire and return to work.
meanings.sent2: Many athletes unretire when they realize they miss competing.
meanings.sent3: The retired teacher unretired to help out with the school play.
meanings.sent4: Just like a phoenix rising from the ashes, he unretired to pursue his passion once more.
meanings.sent5: The decision to unretire brought a new sense of purpose and excitement to her life.

meanings.sent1: He had retired early but had to unretire due to financial reasons.
meanings.sent2: The company policy allowed employees to unretire if they wished to return to work.
meanings.sent3: The retired firefighter unretired to help during the busy wildfire season.
meanings.sent4: She unretired her skills and knowledge to contribute to the community.
meanings.sent5: The decision to unretire was met with mixed emotions but ultimately proved to be the right choice.
